mapper.select: insert into project (project_no, project_state, project_regist_date, project_summary, member_no, category_no) values (project_seq.nextval, 'X', sysdate, #{projectSummary}, #{memberNo}, #{categoryNo})
insert into project (project_no, project_state, project_regist_date, project_summary, member_no, category_no) values (#{projectNo}, 'X', sysdate, #{projectSummary}, #{memberNo}, #{categoryNo})
